EmailTemplate.description: Invitation to BSKL Virtual Open Day
EmailTemplate.name: ! VOD Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn more about BSKL at our Virtual Open Day
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}, We are holding a Primary School Virtual Open Event on 23 July from 2-3pm so you can see our school's outstanding facilities, immerse yourself within our curriculum, meet our Head of Primary and find out what makes our students so happy - all from the comfort of your own home.
Spaces are limited so register your place today to not miss out.
Register today at https://www.nordangliaeducation.com/our-schools/malaysia/kuala-lumpur/british-international/virtual-open-day?utm_source=mailchimp&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=virtualopenevent_local
